name: Seesaw (Bahri Gordebak)
description:
This is a prototype with 10 levels. In every level, you're trying to reach the exit after collecting all the green boxes, but there's twist.

The game allows you to look at the level for only 3 seconds. After that, you play the level without seeing what you're doing. Would you remember the level?

Since this game is a prototype, I'd like some feedback. If you play it, please leave a comment.
